amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency account by $9,518,000; reduces funds for the Departmental Administration account by $20,000,000; and increases funds for the Defense Environmental Cleanup account by $22,586,500.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency account by $9,518,000; reduce funding for the Departmental Administration account by $20,000,000; and increase funding for the Defense Environmental Cleanup account by $22,586,500.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
